EmailTemplate.name: APU Order failed email template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Order has Failed #{!Apttus_Config2__Order__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
This is a notification that an Order has failed due to some technical issue. Please write to dsa@honeywell.com or call us on 1-602-436-6738 (International).
Thank you!
Regards
ASDS Team
